backend/main.mo: Defines core Motoko actor types, state maps, IDs, and admin authorization mixin for orders, bookings, loyalty, districts, artifacts, and delivery zones.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence records describing backend‑frontend integration requirements, related files, components, and associated tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides human‑written summaries for numerous frontend files, describing their purpose and behavior for build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining global OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes and applying core layout styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry file mounting the app root and loading the main TypeScript bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router routes and wraps the app with theme provider and toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Layout wrapper providing header, footer, routing outlet, and bottom nav visibility logic.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminGate.t: Wraps children with admin-access control using Internet Identity, showing loading, login, error, or denial states as needed.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Provides a login/logout button for Internet Identity with handling for authentication state and error recovery.
Booking calendar UI showing selectable dates and static example time slots.
frontend/src/components/BookingRequestFo: Form for submitting booking requests with fields, package customization, validation, and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/BottomNav.tsx: Renders a fixed bottom navigation bar with buttons for key app sections and highlights the active route.
frontend/src/components/home/HomeLiveCou: Shows three live metric counters with fallback values and graceful error handling.
frontend/src/components/InAppNotificatio: Displays a green success-style alert banner with a dismiss button for in‑app notifications.
frontend/src/components/LoyaltyPointsPan: Shows the user’s loyalty points balance and transaction history, handling login and loading states.
frontend/src/components/LoyaltyRedemptio: Lists redeemable rewards, checks point balance, and allows users to redeem items with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/components/MembershipProfil: Manages membership creation or displays existing membership details, including verification and VIP status.
frontend/src/components/OriginMapSection: Displays an origin map and district selector, showing producer details for the selected district.
frontend/src/components/PackageCustomize: Provides a UI to select a base package and toggle add‑ons, pulling available options from queries.
frontend/src/components/SocialImpactMete: Shows environmental impact metrics in cards, with loading handling and metric visualization.
frontend/src/components/VirtualTourSecti: Displays a 360° virtual tour section with zone selection and placeholder content when panoramas are unavailable.
frontend/src/data/menuItems.ts: Defines menu item types, categories, a static list of menu items, and helper functions for filtering by category.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the current identity, reinitializing and invalidating queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity provider and hook managing authentication, identity loading, states, and AuthClient setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrderStatusPolling: Custom hook that polls client orders and queue position, manages countdown timers, and triggers notifications on status changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks wrapping backend actor calls for orders, profiles, queue data, and artifacts.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme variables and base element styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminAnalyticsP: Displays administrative analytics including orders, users, bookings, and members with refresh support.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminBookingsPa: Lists all space bookings for admins with tools to update booking statuses.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminElectricit: Placeholder panel showing upcoming ATS monitoring features.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminInventoryP: Placeholder panel for future inventory management and low-stock alerts.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminLoyaltyRew: Provides a form to create loyalty rewards and displays a list of existing rewards with loading states. Handles validation, submission, and success/error toasts.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminLoyaltyVer: Displays membership requests in a table and allows admins to approve or reject them. Includes loading, empty, and error handling with toast feedback.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminMuseumCont: Allows admins to create artifacts with title, story, and optional audio URL, and shows existing artifacts. Handles form validation, submissions, and toasts.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrdersQueu: Shows active orders with status controls and supports updating order status. Includes loading, error states, and refresh functionality.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOriginMapP: Enables creation of district entries with name, featured product, photo, and description, and lists existing districts. Validates inputs and provides toast feedback.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminPackagesPa: Manages package creation and add-ons with separate forms and displays existing items. Handles loading states and success/error toasts.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSocialImpa: Admin panel React component that lets admins update a metric and displays current metrics with loading states.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Admin dashboard with tabs for managing the orders queue and viewing analytics, gated by admin access.
frontend/src/pages/ArtifactDetailPage.ts: Artifact details page fetching item data and optionally playing its audio story with play/pause controls.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page featuring hero content, navigation buttons, and highlighted digital features of the cafe.
frontend/src/pages/LoyaltyPage.tsx: Loyalty program page with tabs for profile management, points overview, and rewards redemption.
frontend/src/pages/MenuPage.tsx: Displays menu items grouped by category and shows kitchen queue status with estimated wait times.
frontend/src/pages/MiniMuseumPage.tsx: Shows artifact cards with QR-enabled audio stories and includes origin map and social impact sections.
frontend/src/pages/OrderStatusPage.tsx: Tracks a specific order’s real-time status with polling, queue position, and notifications.
frontend/src/pages/SpaceBookingPage.tsx: Provides space booking tools with a calendar, request form, and virtual tour tabs.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and sessionStorage values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining color tokens, typography, container settings, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project state descriptor containing metadata, feature lists, known issues, and pending requirements for the D’ZETA Space app.
